topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555fd5d1636872617c620900#post_555fd5d1636872617c620900
What you're referring to is a creole language. This is a language that originates from two or more languages that blend together to form a new one. Take for example the Filipino language. It is a mixture of Tagalog, Chinese, Spanish, Japanese, Malay, English and others I forgot. Tagalog is the original language of the tribes that lived in what is now Metro Manila.

I ironically like Gilda. I do agree she's a Jerk.

But She wasn't that bad.

Plus when you think about it, Fluttershy's been a lot tougher this Season.

So to the people that don't like Gilda, Just think about this, Fluttershy probably will end up telling her off this episode if she does comeback!
